txt.en: Near the river Entwash, Quickbeam's Huorn suddenly becomes distressed as it tries to wipe viscous slime from one of its roots. It shambles to a nearby tree that has grown brittle and lifeless before smearing the slime onto its trunk. \n\nThe trunk shows signs of renewed health, and although such a remedy seems unlikely, you decide to aid the Huorn in healing the other wounded trees nearby.
A Natural Remedy
You have healed many trees with slug-slime.
Completed
DNT
Unknown to all save for the Ents and Huorns, the slime of Fangorn's slugs can be used to heal weak and dying trees.

Slugs can be found in western Fangorn along the shores of the river Entwash.\n\nQuickbeam's Huorn wants you to heal wounded trees in Fangorn with slug-slime.

This tree is in need of healing
This tree is in need of healing

You have healed a number of trees in Fangorn, hopefully reversing damage done to them by the new inhabitants of the forest. \n\nAlthough your aid is not immediately noticeable, in time the trees will once again grow tall and green.
